_comment: Captain definitions. Each captain has a passive (stat bonuses) and an active ability (template-based). Passive effects are applied as flat bonuses at run start.

captain_1.name: Captain 1
captain_1.description: Offense-focused captain. Specializes in maximizing damage output with a devastating burst ability.

captain_2.name: Captain 2
captain_2.description: Defense-focused captain. Specializes in survival with an emergency shield ability.

active_ability.name: Emergency Shields
active_ability.description: Become invulnerable for 3 seconds and restore 30% max HP.

captain_3.name: Captain 3
captain_3.description: Utility-focused captain. Specializes in economy and control with a powerful crowd control ability.

active_ability.name: Gravity Well
active_ability.description: Slow all enemies on screen by 50% for 6 seconds.
